Series.Overview:
An animated pre-school series about a community of birds that live, learn and play in the branches of a beautiful old tree. The vibrant treetop community of 3rd & Bird is alive with singing, whistling and dancing.
In each episode we follow Samuel and Muffin Lovebird, two adorable young birds, as they explore their community and their world.

Episode.Overview: Muffin wants to learn to fly but it's difficult. Mr Beakman tells her to keep trying.
Muffin wants to be in Mr Beakman's play, but there is no part for her.
Samuel, Muffin and Rudy each make up a silly song for the concert.

Episode.EpisodeName: To Play or not to Play
Episode.Overview: Samuel and Rudy are playing, but they can't agree on what game to play.
Mr Beakman is building a train set. Muffin tries to help but she makes things worse.
Rudy, Samuel and Muffin invite the whole town to see the Rudy Show.
Samuel and Muffin ask Mrs Lovebird to fly them to the super slide, but she is too busy.
Samuel wants to be an apple tree at the costume party, but Muffin eats his apple.
Samuel and Rudy invite Muffin to a picnic with their friend Elliot.
Quinn builds Muffin a bouncy pogo nest and warns her it will only fit one bird at a time.
Everyone practises a dance for the big dance party, but Samuel can't find his rhythm.
Mrs Lovebird asks Samuel and Rudy to watch Muffin as she plays in her toy nest-car.
Samuel, Muffin and Rudy are going on a picnic and Samuel insists that it be perfect.
Rudy pushes the pie-making machine's forbidden red button and it goes berserk.
Muffin hops around the community, innocently taking things that do not belong to her.
Samuel and Rudy build Muffin a giant papier-mache dinosaur for Muffin.
Rudy and Samuel show Muffin the joys of camping.
The group helps Mrs Billingsley up a hill in time to see the lovely meteor shower.
Mr Beakman and Muffin decide to put on a magic show together.
Samuel, Muffin and Rudy head over to frozen Branch Lake with Mr Beakman for ice-skating.
When Samuel and Rudy won't let Muffin into their playhouse, she decides to build her own.
The kids help Muffin dress up as a cowgirl.
Muffin finds a strange plant, but it smells so terrible that no one wants it in the tree.
Mr Beakman's three-year-old nephew Jordan comes to visit, but Muffin is not happy about it.
It is Christmas Eve and Samuel hears a strange squook coming from the tree.
Muffin builds her own amusement park, but she needs help to make the rides work.
A kitten gets stuck in the tree, but Samuel and Mr Beakman are scared to go near her.
The community is throwing a fiesta, but the mariachi band can't make it.
When Muffin gets stuck in the middle of a lake, the other birds have to rescue her.
Elliot the worm decides that he'd like to join the budgies, but the rules won't allow it.
Mr Beakman is mounting an art show but the kids can't agree on what to paint for it.
Muffin drops her favourite toy, Chloe, and Mr Beakman leads a rescue expedition.
Rudy borrows Quinn's bike for the day and she and Samuel go on a road trip, but get lost.
Samuel and Rudy convince Muffin to paint a fence for them.
A storm blows Missy's pear house out of the tree with Missy still inside.
Muffin rides Samuel's scooter without his permission.
Samuel and Rudy race each other in a seedbox derby.
Elliot gets stuck aboard a runaway Muffin Express.
Mr Beakman explains to Rudy, Muffin and Samuel that they can't possibly fly to the moon.
Muffin and Baby Jordan are playing when they are drawn to a basket tied to some balloons.
Muffin spends a day with her daddy, who is the tree superintendent.
Mr Beakman leads the kids on a pirate adventure looking for buried treasure.
The wind-up robot Quinn made malfunctions and runs amok through 3rd and Bird.
Muffin wants to play Mummy, and Mr Beakman agrees to play with her.
Muffin introduces the community to her new friend, Ben the Pig.
Samuel and Muffin are invited to Elliot's worm picnic, but Aunt Esther is rude to them.
A Peacock Prince visits and the group are worried about doing or saying the wrong thing.
The community takes an evening hike, but Muffin and Jordan get lost in the dark.
Mr Lovebird and Mr Beakman get very competitive at the 3rd and Bird Community Picnic.
Everybirdy is excited to perform at the Bird Theatre's talent show.
The Lovebirds fly to Jamaica for their holiday but Samuel misses 3rd and Bird.
